column4: hi folks - anyone had a problem (this is Ubuntu 8.10) where the system bell reverts to the hardware beep (which cannot be volume-downed or muted).  It's a HELLISHLY loud sound, and I don't know why it just started happening.
my  next step is to try a reboot, but i'm in the middle of several things, would prefer not to.
Then why is 4.2 in full release?
